snippet.name: dateselector
snippet.starttext: <seform:dateselector id="$${id}" label="$${label}" arrange="$${arrange:horizontal|vertical}" rowid="$${rowid}" labelclass="$${labelclass}" labelstyle="$${labelstyle}" value="$${value}" datefieldcss="$${datefieldcss}" datemask="$${datemask:m/d/yyyy}" showdatemask="$${showdatemask:no|yes}" timefieldid="$${timefieldid}" timefieldvalue="$${timefieldvalue}" timefieldcss="$${timefieldcss}" timemask="$${timemask}" showtimemask="$${showtimemask:no|yes}" calendariconsrc="$${calendariconsrc}" stylesheet="$${stylesheet}" onpropertychange="$${onpropertychange}" note="$${note}" datetimerequired="$${datetimefieldrequired:no|yes}" />
